DATABASE_URL.description: Mongodb url from https://cloud.mongodb.com/, guide: https://del.dog/mongodb_guide

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Given app name to the Heroku App

LOG_CHANNEL_ID.description: [ Private Telegram Log Channel ID ], Note: Also add your Bot to LOG CHANNEL !

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Get a Heroku API key from http://dashboard.heroku.com/account

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this using Notes in ' https://t.me/UX_xplugin_support ' or `bash genStr`

BOT_TOKEN.description: Get this from https://t.me/botfather and enable Inline Mode. (ADD YOUR BOT IN LOG CHANNEL)

OWNER_ID.description: Your user_id(s) e.g 123456789 or mutiple ids

PREF_BRANCH.description: Branch you want to use, Don't change unless you change Upstream repo

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: Don't Change this unless you maintain your own Fork
